clusterList.phrase: a modern retail award must reflect the modern retail market which requires flexibility and the current award is structured around fixed trading conditions

the previous award was focused on the regulated market of monday to friday working weeks the ara's submission also draws upon employee benefit schemes from other sectors to be incorporated in a modern retail award such as salary sacrificing for superannuation and other modern day needs
the 2008 09 award has already been accepted and staff have received their increase in pay
